origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'RegulatoryAPI.get_data', 'description': 'This function provides regulatory data for a specified region and category.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'region', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The region for which to retrieve regulatory data.'}, {'name': 'dataCategory', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The category of regulatory data to retrieve, e.g., real_estate_laws, zoning_codes.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'regulatoryData', 'description': 'The regulatory data for the specified region and category.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 RegulatoryAPI.get_data, 它的参数输入如下: 'region'是'Downtown City', 'dataCategory'是'real_estate_laws'.
